column5: With the nice weather this spring I managed to get out a few times to fish for Suckers and Carp at the local creek. Nothing that big but fun to catch regardless.
Nice to have a creek close to ya with some good rod benders in it!  That's a beauty carp, Bob.
Nice catch. I like your attitude. It is all good. Fish and have fun.
Nice fish it's always nice to have a creek like that close by
